scripts.test:integration: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yaml up -d && dotenv -e .env.test -- prisma migrate deploy && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest -i -c jest.config.integration.js && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yaml down
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development ./wait-for-it.sh postgres:5432 -- nodemon --ignore __test__/ --watch src -e ts --exec ts-node src/main.ts
scripts.start: ./wait-for-it.sh postgres:5432 -- prisma migrate deploy && node dist/main.js
